title: Soul Nomad OST
description:
Ok, this is the Original Soundtrack for Soul Nomad & The World Eaters. It's available online in certain places but you have to download them individually which is a hassle. 

Disc 01

   1. Echoing Prayers
   2. RED BOOTS
   3. Seasons Past
   4. Dragon's Eye
   5. Moon Cradle
   6. Legends of the Exiled
   7. Morning of Awakening
   8. Escape Artist
   9. Street of December
  10. Last Supper
  11. Dark Harp
  12. Cradle March
  13. Speed Queen
  14. Love Letters
  15. BAD BOYS
  16. Crisis Climax
  17. Will you Dance?
  18. Desperado
  19. Gemini
  20. Levin
  21. Woody Chips
  22. Tears of Cradle
  23. Crying for Dark Sky

Disc 02

   1. Piece of Legend
   2. Maize Forest
   3. God's Reflection
   4. Cradle Blues
   5. Tow-color Necklace
   6. Magic Man
   7. Foamera - Risomio
   8. Royal Emblem
   9. Land of God, Drazil
  10. Crach Landing
  11. For the Glancing Smile
  12. Deep Piano
  13. Shocking RED
  14. Requiem of Gemini
  15. Magician's Illusion
  16. Wandering Apparition
  17. Broken Faraway Dreams
  18. Jazzy Glass
  19. Drazil's Anger
  20. Against the Wind
  21. Rock'n Rocks
  22. Deep-six
  23. Babylon of Souls
  24. Cradle of the Ivory Moon
